The Guide Image Manager

To include images in your store -- click "Browse" to select an image file from your computer, then click "Submit". The files must have a .jpg, .gif or .png file extension and are limited to 100K in file size, although the file size should be minimized to prevent users from having to wait for long file downloads.
The following image files have already been uploaded. Click on the filename to preview the image or delete to remove the image.

Enter a title and article for a specific category. The title and article will appear to the appropriate user based on the Category user type. Enter a sequence number, date and optional reference to track the source of the article.

SECURITY LEVEL: Company defined for Members (for example: 0=everyone, 1=non-employees 2=employees, 3=supervisors, 4=managers, 5=executives, etc.). Each Member can access Articles at his Security Level and lower.
